::Zardus::

"No," Zardus replies to Imprisoner's transmission, "Back away from the
CF, but do not fire on it. We arn't here to destroy it again."

He saw a target, firing two of his draining missiles at Autofire.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (I forgot to add this in my last post)
> 
> 
> Imprisoner:
> 
> 
> 
> Imprisoner never used conventional comm. frequencies because they
could be 
> jammed, and unknowingly to him that was what was going on.  He
opened a inner 
> monologue comm. link with Zardus.
> 
> "Zardus, the CF was hit with friendly fire and the Maximals are
firing 
> heavily on me.  I can't handle much more.  Requesting permission to
attack 
> them fully."
